Attacks.Name: Psywave
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Confused special condition.

Attacks.Name: Psychic
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is lifted and placed within range 2 of their current position.

Attacks.Name: Shadow Ball
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals piercing damage, ignoring part of the target's defense. If a wild is rolled, apply the Stun special condition to the target character.

Superpowers.Name: Telekinesis
Superpowers.Effect: Place an enemy character within range 3 and line of sight anywhere within range 2 of its current position.

Superpowers.Name: Psychic Barrier
Superpowers.Effect: Add 3 dice to Mewtwo's defense rolls until the start of its next activation.

Attacks.Name: Mind Storm
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, deal 1 automatic damage to all enemy characters within range 2 of the target.

Superpowers.Name: Recover
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 3 damage from Mewtwo. This superpower can be used only once per game.
